name: Light Eater
description:
Light shows things that cannot be seen. It creates a comfort of the unknown. But not everything is shown in the light. Don’t be afraid of the dark. Be afraid of what’s in the dark.

In this game you use the visible light spectrum to avoid unseen dangers and determine possible futures. Step into the role of someone who has been selected to do a special test! Choose the outcome of AI choices while trying to evade imminent threats.

Features:
1. Gameplay where you use the visible light spectrum (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet) to detect unseen threats.
2. Visibility limited to the field of view of your light.
3. The horror is set around the unseen and the sound from the unseen.
4. Original scores of music.
5. Original audio sounds and dialogue.

Gameplay:
Set in a location unknown, you must navigate through a facility that was meant to test the seen and unseen. You must explore the facility and try to determine what your purpose for being there is.
Use your light to navigate the visible light spectrum in order to make unseen threats into seen. Hack through parts of the game to unlock more explorable area's. Navigate under pressure and find the right path to the end.
